column1: |产品名称|产品型号|功能描述|
|OTN 接入设备|HT8000-02|提供两个 10G 端口在 UNI 侧（10GE/STM-64/10G FC），NNI 侧 4*OTU2 端口（支持 1+1 保护）|
|OTN 接入设备|HT8000-03|提供 8*Any-rate 端口在 UNI 侧（100Mbps~10Gbps），NNI 侧 2*OTU2 端口|
|OTN 接入设备|HT8000-13|提供 10*Any-rate 端口在 UNI 侧（100Mbps~10Gbps），具有 L2 或 MPLS-TP 交换功能，NNI 侧 2*OTU2 端口|
|OTN/xWDM|HT8000-I|1U 模块化设计，支持 8/16 波长，带有 EDFA/DCM/OLP 卡|
|Packet OTN/xWDM|HT8000-IIE|2U 模块化设计，支持 8/16/40 波长，带有 EDFA/DCM/OLP 卡|
|OTN/xWDM|HT8000-VI|6U 模块化设计，支持 40/80 波长，带有 EDFA/DCM/OLP 卡|

column3: Description
Provides functions such as encapsulation, mapping, and multiplexing of multi-service signals such as SDH, Ethernet, and OTN to ODUk (k=0, 1, 2, 2e, flex) channel signals;
Provides time division multiplexing of ODUk (k=0,1,2,2e,flex) channel signals and mapping and multiplexing of ODUk to OTUk (k=1,2) line interfaces.
The service adaptation function completes the access and mapping encapsulation processing of the Ethernet service.
Support for port-based VLANs
Supports port QinQ, and supports transparent transmission, switching, adding, and stripping of C-VLAN and S-VLAN for Ethernet services.
Provides switching capabilities based on Ethernet ports, VLANs, and MAC addresses
Support MPLS-TP-based LSP and PW exchange
Support STP/RSTP/MSTP  Support remote loop detection

Supports traffic classification, traffic policing, and other functions:  Supports rate limiting for the rate of receiving and sending packets on a port or a custom stream, and provides common traffic policing for custom flows and 2Rate3color two-speed three-color traffic monitoring capabilities.  Supports CAR (Committed Access Rate), traffic shaping (Traffic Shapping), and traffic statistics.  Supports packet mirroring and packet redirection for ports or custom flows.  Supports priority marking of ports or custom flows, and provides Remark capability of 802.1P and DSCP priority.  Supports advanced queue scheduling based on ports or custom flows, supporting 4 priority queues per port/stream, providing WRR, SP, and FIFO queue scheduling algorithms
Support NNI side 1+1 protection
Plug and play, configuration free service
Supports monitoring, detecting, and measuring network packet loss rate, delay, and jitter.
Support command line interface (CLI), console port, Telnet, and WEB configuration management  Support SNMPv1/v2/v3  Support network management system
2*OTU2
Y
